name: Swoopy Boi
description:
Swoop posties, hipsters, and more characters as they walk down the street, but watch out for cyclists wearing spiky helmets, and posties who fight back.

UNLOCK all the characters by increasing your total number of swoops.

Highlights:

  • Simple one-tap controls
  • Easy to learn, hard to master
  • Original music
  • Hand-drawn characters
  • Poop on people

If you like it please consider downloading it on mobile below to get on the leaderboard.

Thank you!
